faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a 3BHK Flat in Sector 105 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get detailed answers to common queries regarding property buying investment potential legal aspects and possession status in Sector 105 Gurugram.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 3BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 105 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The pricing for a 3BHK flat in Sector 105 varies significantly based on factors such as the builder project quality size floor level and specific amenities offered. Generally, prices start from approximately INR 1.5 Crores for standard sized units in newly launched projects and can go up to INR 3 Crores or higher for ultra-luxury or larger residences in premium societies. It is always recommended to consult our property experts who can provide real-time accurate pricing and availability based on your budget and preference.

faqs.question: Is Sector 105 Gurugram a good area for long-term investment purposes
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 105 is widely regarded as one of the best areas for long-term investment in Gurugram particularly along the Dwarka Expressway corridor. The combination of excellent physical infrastructure superior connectivity to Delhi IGI Airport and the presence of world-class residential and commercial projects guarantees strong capital appreciation potential. Government focus on completing the expressway only solidifies its position as a high-growth investment zone.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity of Sector 105 to Central Gurugram and Delhi
faqs.answer: Connectivity is a major strength of Sector 105. It is directly connected to the Dwarka Expressway providing a signal-free link to Dwarka Sector 21 and the IGI Airport. It also offers easy access to NH 48 allowing for quick travel to Cyber City and other central Gurugram sectors like Sector 84 and Sector 83. The sector lies close to the proposed metro extension route further boosting its accessibility in the near future.

faqs.question: Are the 3BHK flats in Sector 105 RERA registered and legally secure
faqs.answer: All reputable housing projects and 3BHK flats listed by us in Sector 105 are RERA Registered and comply fully with the Real Estate Regulatory Authority guidelines. RERA registration ensures project transparency mandatory disclosures and financial security for buyers. We prioritize legal due diligence checking all title deeds occupancy certificates and necessary approvals before presenting any property to ensure a secure purchase.

faqs.question: What is the typical size in square feet for a 3BHK flat in this sector
faqs.answer: The size of 3BHK flats in Sector 105 typically ranges between 1600 square feet to over 2400 square feet built-up area depending on the project category and developer. Luxury projects often offer larger formats including servant quarters or utility rooms. We can provide detailed floor plans and super area calculations for specific listings to help you determine the exact size that meets your family's requirements.

faqs.question: What kind of amenities can I expect in the premium societies of Sector 105
faqs.answer: Premium societies in Sector 105 offer a rich array of amenities designed for a luxurious lifestyle. This includes large central clubhouses swimming pools dedicated sports facilities such as tennis and basketball courts fully functional gyms spa services and dedicated children’s play areas. Furthermore 24/7 power backup multi-tier security systems and landscaped gardens are standard features enhancing resident comfort and security.

faqs.question: Are there ready-to-move options available for 3BHK flats or only under construction projects
faqs.answer: Sector 105 offers a balanced mix of both ready-to-move RTM and under-construction projects for 3BHK flats. The RTM options allow immediate possession and bypass construction risk while under-construction units often provide a better entry price and payment flexibility. We maintain an up-to-date inventory covering both types enabling you to choose based on your immediate need and investment horizon.

faqs.question: How does Sector 105 compare to other neighbouring sectors like Sector 106 or Sector 109
faqs.answer: While neighbouring sectors like 106 and 109 are also developing along the Dwarka Expressway Sector 105 often benefits from a slightly more advanced stage of infrastructure completion in certain micro-pockets and a concentration of higher-end luxury projects. All three sectors are excellent investment choices but Sector 105 provides strong access metrics and a robust social infrastructure pipeline.

faqs.question: What are the common extra charges or hidden costs when buying a 3BHK in Sector 105
faqs.answer: Transparency is key. Apart from the basic sale price common extra charges typically include GST Registration Charges Stamp Duty Maintenance Deposits Electricity and Water Connection Charges and the cost of parking spaces. We ensure a clear breakdown of all applicable charges and avoid any hidden costs providing you with a comprehensive cost sheet upfront.

faqs.question: Can I get home loan assistance for purchasing a 3BHK flat in Sector 105
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We maintain strong partnerships with leading national and private banks and financial institutions including SBI HDFC ICICI and Axis Bank. Our financial advisory team assists prospective buyers of 3BHK flats in securing competitive home loan rates and navigating the entire application and approval process effortlessly ensuring a smooth transaction.
